pageProduct.name: Olay Complete UV Protection Moisturiser Lotion Sensitive SPF15 150mL
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Olay Complete UV Protection Moisturiser Lotion Sensitive SPF15 with aloe & chamomile extracts. Designed for Sensitive Skin. Non-greasy formula contains nourishing OLAY moisture that provides 24 hours lasting hydration.

OLAY With Aloe & Chamomile Extracts OLAY® COMPLETE UV PROTECTION MOISTURE LOTION SPF 15 BROAD SPECTRUM SENSITIVE No added Fragrance and Colorants.

Suitable For: Sensitive Skin

Size: 150ml

Dermatologist Tested?: Yes

Non-Comedogenic?: Yes

Skin Type: Sensitive

SPF: 15

KEY FEATURES

• Why is Complete Sensitive Lotion Right for me?
Because it is a daily facial moisturiser that has been specially designed to give sensitive skin what it needs to help maintain and improve the healthy look of your skin. Soothes skin with Aloe & Chamomile.
• How does it work?
It contains essential ingredients your skin needs:
• Nourishing OLAY moisture
• SPF 15 broad spectrum protection
• Skin pampering vitamins
• MOISTURISES
Non-greasy formula contains nourishing OLAY moisture that provides 24 hours lasting hydration.

PROTECTS
Provides SPF 15 and broad spectrum UV protection to help prevent premature skin aging.
• NOURISHING FORMULA
With Vitamins B3 & E and Pro-Vitamin B5, the formula helps re-texturise skin appearance for healthy looking skin.
SolaSheer Technology™
Dermatologically Tested
Non-Comedogenic (Won't Clog Pores)

Warnings

For external use on unbroken skin only. Use product as directed. May be irritant to eyes. Avoid contact with eyes. If contact occurs, rinse eyes with water. If eye or skin irritation develops, discontinue use. Keep out of reach of children. Contains hydroxybenzoates and benzyl alcohol.

Ingredients

ACTIVE INGREDIENTS:
Octyl salicylate 4% w/w
Butyl methoxydibenzoylmethane 2% w/w
Octocrylene 1% w/w
Phenylbenzimidazole sulfonic acid 1% w/w

PRESERVATIVES: Ethyl Hydroxybenzoate, Methyl Hydroxybenzoate, Propyl Hydroxybenzoate

Active Ingredients: Octyl Salicylate 4% w/w, Butyl Methoxydibenzoylmethane 2% w/w, Octocrylene 1% w/w, Phenylbenzimidazole Sulfonic Acid 1% w/w.

Contains: Hydroxybenzoates and Benzyl Alcohol

Directions

Apply liberally and gently massage onto your face and neck.

STORAGE INSTRUCTIONS

Store below 30°C.

Storage Temperature: Below 30°C

Recyclable Packaging?: Yes
